comments.text:
Clearing history fixed the problem. Thanks so much! 

(FYI, the trouble shooting instructions need to be updated. By default we don't show the menu bar any more.)

I'm closing. I'll have my friend try it on the other computer as well and reopen if it doesn't work.

Thanks, everyone!
comments.author: stormy@mozilla.com

(In reply to Matthias Versen (Matti) from comment #9)
> most likely a stale 302/303 in the cache

Hmm, would it be wrong to delete that cached entry when it leads to a 404
or other error?

I wonder how common this problem is - bug 691433, bug 688243, bug 685262
on just FoxNews.com worries me...

comments.raw_text:
we had other reports about caching issues with 301/302 in the last few weeks/months.
did we change the caching for 302 since Gecko1.9.2 ?
btw: caching a 302 for a longer time seems to me a little bit counterproductive
